summary: Internal performance issue having wider effects.

updates.details: SOF storage slow/unresponsive due to internal performance issue, causing many machines to be unresponsive. Vendor engaged with investigating. New jobs prevented from being started from LOTUS queues to reduce load on SOF storage system, new jobs still queued and will be run once issues resolved.

Issues with from earlier this week are now resolved, please report any further problems to the JASMIN helpdesk, but please only once the other issue with SOF storage (having wider effects) have been resolved.
